results.overview: While working underground to fix a water main, Brooklyn plumbers—and brothers—Mario and Luigi are transported down a mysterious pipe and wander into a magical new world. But when the brothers are separated, Mario embarks on an epic quest to find Luigi.
results.title: The Super Mario Bros. Movie

results.overview: Mario and Luigi, plumbers from Brooklyn, find themselves in an alternate universe where evolved dinosaurs live in hi-tech squalor. They're the only hope to save our universe from invasion by the dino dictator, Koopa.
results.title: Super Mario Bros.

results.original_title: スーパーマリオブラザーズ ピーチ姫救出大作戦!
results.overview: When Princess Peach is kidnapped by the monster King Koopa, Mario and his brother Luigi journey to the Mushroom Kingdom to rescue her.
results.title: Super Mario Brothers: Great Mission to Rescue Princess Peach

results.overview: Mario Bros. Mix is a DVD with episodes from The Super Mario Bros. Super Show!, The Adventures of Super Mario Bros. 3, and Super Mario World. results.title: Mario Bros Mix

results.original_title: Super Mario Bros: This Ain't No Video Game
results.overview: A documentary about the making of the live-action Super Mario Bros. movie.
results.title: Super Mario Bros: This Ain't No Video Game

results.overview: Mario Bros. Mix is a DVD with episodes from The Super Mario Bros. Super Show!, The Adventures of Super Mario Bros. 3, and Super Mario World.
results.title: Super Mario Bros. Mix

results.original_title: The History of Super Mario Bros 3 100% World Records
results.overview: Summoning Salt's video encompassing the world record history of SMB3 100%.
results.title: The History of Super Mario Bros 3 100% World Records

results.original_title: Super Mario Bros.: Once Upon a Koopa
results.overview: Mario climbs a beanstalk to take on a giant Koopa in "Mario and the Beanstalk"; "The Adventures of Sherlock Mario" finds the brothers sleuthing; "Hooded Robin and His Mario Men" recover stolen gold from the Sheriff of Koopingham; a Koopa is the big bad wolf in "Little Red Riding Princess"; and a monster is unleashed in "Koopenstein."
results.title: Super Mario Bros.: Once Upon a Koopa
